title: The Blue Devil
description: Dead bodies are popping up in Lobrooke and they have Blue’s name written on them, literally.  The Blue Devil is one of the most feared creatures walking the planet as she should be. Losing grip of her sanity and humanity most of the time from an ability that’s both a blessing and a curse, Blue has built a reputation that lets others know to stay the fuck out of her way. She’s cold, ruthless, and powerful, however she’s not invincible and someone is out to prove that.Now Blue is forced to work with the man who put nearly half a dozen bullets in her just a few weeks ago and a stick in the mud law enforcement agent, neither of whom she trust. If she wants to survive, she must put aside her pride and trust issues before the people she cares about join the string of bodies appearing in Lobrooke.
author: Quirah Casey
